DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, comparative randomized controled trial. The general purposes of this study is to compare the efficacy and safety of TVTO™ and TVTSecur™ as surgical treatment for female urinary stress incontinence.
DOC.brief_title: TVTO™ X TVTS ™ for Treatment of Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: Clinical and urodynamic for stress urinary Detrusor overactivity (urodynamic study) Urodynamic changes suggesting reduced vesical capacity Associated neurological diseases Coagulopathies Pregnancy Foreign matter sensitiveness history Acute urinary tract infection Sequel from high ionizing radiation exposure Use of drugs that may result in high surgical risk and/or significant postoperative complication Anesthetic procedure contraindication Vulvovaginitis: presence of vaginal secretion with infection clinically or lab supported
